Description: Text gives a list of publications that explain why America entered the war and why the conflict must continue until the aims are achieved. Illustration shows a map of Europe and Asia, with colored shaded areas to show the Pan-German plan.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Washington, D.C. : Committee on Public Information,

Title: Why Germany wants peace
